reviews: \nThis is our \u201cnewest Alexa\u201d 4th generation (we have and use 3 others in our house), and we are very pleased with this model!!  this one is definitely \u201ctop notch\u201d and the most sophisticated one...works  better than the first 3 generation-ones!!  The Sound is of a much higher quality - - you can talk a little bit faster into it and it understands everything (generally on the first time, and you don\u2019t have to repeat yourself), AND, the music sound (its speaker) is unmatched/ would absolutely recommend the \u201c4th generation\u201d to anyone considering on buying an ALEXA!!!!\n

reviews: \nI was not initially a fan of Alexa and only got it for my kids though I liked the idea of the hub to control the other Echo devices. After a month, Alexa is now my personal secretary. I\u2019m a software engineer and I\u2019m impressed with this technology. I just hope she never revolts and becomes a terminator.\n

dates: Reviewed in the United States \U0001f1fa\U0001f1f8 on September 5, 2021
titles: Love the control of my smart devices
reviews: \nAbsolutely Love this. Read that it might have trouble hooking up because I have Xfinity internet but it could not have been easier. Now I have complete control of all my smart devices, lights, plug-ins, thermostat, tv. I get by when it comes to computers but set up routines like it was nothing.  Very easy to use. Would differently recommend.\n

reviews: \nLove it love it and yes thats twice. Im 71 yrs old and the sound that comes out of that ball lol is outstanding. Alexa where have you been all my life.\n

reviews: \nI really love my Amazon Echo but what\u2019s up with all these photos of this speaker (including on the box it comes in) showing an attractive digital clock under Echo\u2019s skin \u2026 glowing white numbers showing the time? Um, there is no clock. What a disappointment and false advertising.\n

titles: The sound is unreal, but make sure it can do what you want it to first.
reviews: \nOkay so I am in love! The sound is amazing \U0001f49c my only issue is that you cannot connect more than 1 Dot to your smart TV. I wanted to use them as rear speakers and I can only connect one at a time. Otherwise she woukd get a 5 star rating!!!\n

reviews: \nLouder volume for better music experience. Better base, and adorable looking, modernized device. I purchased my new Echo 4th Generation in twilight blue. reviews: \nI was given an Echo/Alexa 4th Generation as a Christmas gift. The sound had a intermittent static issue. Amazon replaced it immediately. The replacement works perfectly. The sound quality including the bass on the 4th Generation is superior to the previous generations. I bought a second 4th Generation to set up a stereo speaker group, which includes a Echo Sub. The combo sounds great.\n

dates: Reviewed in the United States \U0001f1fa\U0001f1f8 on January 2, 2021
reviews: \nReceived as a gift for Christmas and find it to be great for playing music, getting the weather, setting timers and creating shopping lists. Amazed that the Echo found a printer and connected to it on it's own! Still learning all its capabilities and looking forward to using the Echo.\n

dates: Reviewed in the United States \U0001f1fa\U0001f1f8 on July 24, 2021
reviews: \nEcho is terrific..was about to buy speakers to place outside my back porch until my son gave me speaker for my birthday. The sound and loudness is incredible reaches my entire back yard with sound.\n

dates: Reviewed in the United States \U0001f1fa\U0001f1f8 on September 22, 2021
reviews: \nI have a couple of these now.  Like to locate them in the areas where we listen to music the most since the sound quality is so good.\n

dates: Reviewed in the United States \U0001f1fa\U0001f1f8 on January 14, 2021
reviews: \nDifficulty in  getting Alexa to respond despite very good location and strong router signal. Have not noticed any operational improvement from my previous Echo Plus\n

dates: Reviewed in the United States \U0001f1fa\U0001f1f8 on November 11, 2020
reviews: \nWas expecting better sound quality compared to my echo dot, but did not notice any real difference.  Voice commands not as \u201csnappy\u201d as the dot.  Sometimes Have to repeat Alexa commands.\n

dates: Reviewed in the United States \U0001f1fa\U0001f1f8 on June 17, 2021
reviews: \nWe bought this to use by our swimming pool. The sound is great and is such a pleasure just to tell Alexa what we want to listen to rather than having to walk over to change the station.\n

dates: Reviewed in the United States \U0001f1fa\U0001f1f8 on January 4, 2022
reviews: \nSound quality is improved. The device aesthetics are also improved.  Alexa has some new features as well.\n

dates: Reviewed in the United States \U0001f1fa\U0001f1f8 on August 8, 2021
titles: We loved this music sounds great.
reviews: \nEasy to set up. Sounds better then I thought it would.\n
